resources.string: Scan New QR Code Again Anytime
Please find QR Code near by then click on Scan QR Code button below.
Where do you want to go?
Room you entered is invalid or empty field.\nPlease enter room number you\'re looking for.
Room number [%1$s] you entered not found.\nPlease verify room number and re-enter following format Building-Room.\nFor example: CC1-230.
The building [%1$s] you entered not found.\nPlease verify building and re-enter following format CC1 exmple.
Take a %1$s and go forward, the room is locate on your %2$s.
Take the main stair from CC1 building to %1$s floor and turn %2$s. The room is locate on your %3$s.
Take the main stair to %1$s floor and turn %2$s. The room is locate on your %3$s.
You\'re in building %1$s and want to go to building %2$s.
Exit building from West entrance on the 1st floor. The building %1$s is locate straight ahead on your %2$s.
Exit building from South entrance on the 1st floor. The building %1$s is locate straight ahead on your %2$s.
Turn around.\nRoom %1$s is locate behind you.

Looking String break down:
Building: %1$s
Floor: %2$s
Room Number: %3$s
Room Location: %4$s

Scan String break down:
Building: %1$s
Floor: %2$s
Room Number: %3$s
Room Side: %4$s
Index Location: %5$s
Loc Name: %6$s
